summary: This document is a chain of emails from April-May 2021 between FBI agents, NYPD task force members, and an Assistant U.S. Attorney, discussing a potential lead regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The lead involves a person named 'M' who works security for a family and a woman who works in finance and claims to have information about Epstein's finances. The emails coordinate scheduling an interview.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named alongside Jeffrey Epstein as a subject about whom a potential witness claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker. The potential witness claims to have information about his finances and relationships.

connections.description: M works security for the family of the unnamed woman and acted as an intermediary to arrange her meeting with law enforcement.
Referenced together as subjects about whom a potential witness claims to have information and documents.
The woman is described as having knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein and his finances, and works in finance herself.

events.title: Initial lead description from M
events.description: An NYPD/FBI task force member reports speaking with M, who states a woman wants to meet to discuss her knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein and his finances. She has an attorney but is willing to speak without one.

events.title: Scheduling of interview
events.description: FBI agents and NYPD task force members coordinate via email to schedule a WebEx interview, settling on Thursday morning at 9:30 am.

locations: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force Office
United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A potential witness, a woman who works in finance and is connected to a family employing security contact M, claims to have significant information about Jeffrey Epstein's finances and relationships.
The lead was forwarded by an individual whose brother is an NYPD Lieutenant, indicating the information came through law enforcement personal connections.
Law enforcement (FBI/NYPD task force and an AUSA) actively coordinated in April-May 2021 to schedule an interview with this witness via WebEx.
The witness had an attorney but was reportedly willing to speak to law enforcement without the attorney present.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative activity related to Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein well after Epstein's death.
